cause.description:
My cousin has this awful disease and one of my other family members died from it. So i just wanted to try and help raise money for the MD fund to help find a cure, and save peoples lives. But it's not all about raising money, it's about people coming together to support a great cause. Thanks!
1. help find a cure
cause.mission: help find a cure for Muscular Dystrophy
cause.name: Chris's Fund
